generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white directional arrows painted on its surface, indicating it is a roadway for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A paved path running parallel to the road on the right side, separated by a curb and bordered by vegetation, is visible. This path is designated for pedestrians or cyclists.
- vegetation: Dense green trees and shrubs are visible along the right side of the road and in the background, forming a natural barrier.
- person: A person is visible on the right side of the road, riding a bicycle.
- rider: The person riding the bicycle is classified as a rider.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a dark-colored car directly ahead and other vehicles further down the road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible along the road, including those supporting the traffic light and streetlights.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on a pole on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- wall: A large concrete wall with graffiti is visible on the left side of the road, running alongside the highway overpass.
- fence: There is no fence visible in the image.
